title: The Magic of the Arts in Special Education
desc: Please join us for a screening of selected excerpts from  , a rich and moving documentary that centers on students in special education engaged in a multi-Arts program at P94M, a public school in NYC. Following will be a panel discussion focusing on building and sustaining quality Arts programs ? wholly school-based and collaborations with outside Arts organizations ? for special learners. Topics to be explored are the components necessary to maintain funding; student, staff and family buy-in; and Department of Education support.
